item.title: Bits - Flyzilla [Bit-Funk?]
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
Nice track!

I like the intro, but maybe make it half the length so the repetition doesn‚Äôt get boring.

Same goes for the part with the first drums. Sounds great, good production (reminds me a little of @Fokkses) but it should be shorter.

Assuming you use 8 bars for the intro without drums, and 8 for the drums without percussion, maybe cut those both down to 4 and then add a melody or something with Bitty or Stress when the percussion comes in.

Listening to the rest of the track, I would just say that overall, your production is great and there aren‚Äôt very many ways you could improve it. The main thing that needs to be improved is the composition & arrangement, since there‚Äôs basically one thing going the whole track. You have a pretty cool thing going and the repetition makes it a little boring. Remember, repetition isn‚Äôt bad by definition, but it can be if the track becomes boring because of it!

Read full topic
